definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: Each settlement of the Pilgrims was a little piece of the Old World inserted into the New.
sentences.chinese: 每一處清教徒的居留地，都是嵌進新大陸的舊世界。

sentences.english: He was traveling in the Low Countries, and subsequently became acquainted with the Pilgrims' church in Leiden.
sentences.chinese: 他到低地國家旅行，隨後與萊頓的清教徒教會相熟。

sentences.english: Puritan women expected to submit to their husbands and to focus on homemaking as their career.
sentences.chinese: 清教徒婦女期望能順服自己的丈夫並專注於家務上。

sentences.english: The Puritan villagers believed all the quarreling was the work of the Devil.
sentences.chinese: 清教徒村民認爲所有的爭執，都是魔鬼的把戲。

sentences.english: He's been sacrificed to the Puritan cause.
sentences.chinese: 他成了新興清教徒事業的犧牲品。

sentences.english: The Puritan ethic of hard work and saving still matters.
sentences.chinese: 清教徒關於勤勞工作和努力存款的道德觀仍然要緊。

sentences.english: He had been the foremost propagandist for the Puritan side.
sentences.chinese: 彌爾頓是清教徒一方最有力的宣傳者。

sentences.english: Bykov had forgotten that Malinin was something of a puritan.
sentences.chinese: 貝科夫已經忘記了馬利寧是個清教徒式的人物。

sentences.english: Why Read the Puritans Today?" by Rev. Don Kistler".
sentences.chinese: 一本用清教徒神學來看律法功用的好書。

sentences.english: Life at the mansion was lavish and lascivious—a Puritan's ninth circle of hell.
sentences.chinese: 一位清教徒的無間煉獄卻是他的生活寫照。
美洲的英國清教徒殖民者。

sentences.english: Many of the old puritan colonist retain their factious temperament in the new world.
sentences.chinese: 許多清教徒開拓者在新大陸仍保持他們好爭論的脾氣。

sentences.english: The puritan in me says that there has to be some pain.
sentences.chinese: 我心裏面的那個清教徒說這會有些疼。

sentences.english: America celebrates the 390th anniversary of the landing of the Pilgrim Fathers.
sentences.chinese: 美國紀念前輩清教徒移民登岸390週年。

sentences.english: Thanksgiving's origin comes from the pilgrims who came on the Mayflower.
sentences.chinese: 感恩節起源於乘“五月花”號來的清教徒。

sentences.english: The Puritans soon followed, for the same reason.
sentences.chinese: 接着，爲了同一緣故，清教徒來了。

definition: Martin Luther (1483-1546), key figure of the Protestant Reformation
